author: Max Walden and Erwin Renaldi
title: Why Indonesia's leader attended 'Russia's Davos' instead of the G7
description: The decision comes after reports earlier this year that Moscow had lobbied Jakarta to house long-range bombers in the country's Papua province.
content:
The decision by Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto to skip the G7 meeting in Canada and to visit Russia has raised eyebrows in Western capitals.
The official reason provided was that his meeting … [+5775 chars]
